name: Warbler's Adventures: Remastered
description:
This is a remake of the Warbler's Adventures game that I originally created in RPG Maker MV! This MZ version is enhanced with more features and has been completed into a full game. Created at iD Tech Camps. 

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Enter, Spacebar, or Z to Confirm
  • Esc or X to Cancel

Credits can be seen in the ending of this game.
